title: Available Now for Immediate Move In
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 42', 'OR Text', '42', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact us.', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 900 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Welcome to Sun Valley- Luxury Apartment Homes in Downtown Pleasant Hill.', 'Here you will find a unique combination of community, value and unparalleled customer service.', 'We believe in delivering a superior rental experience, one that will leave you completely satisfied with both your apartment and your management.', 'Let us show you all the benefits of our community today!', 'We offer high quality, renovated, modern, stylish apartment homes with upgraded granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, In-unit Washer & Dryers, built in USB ports, Over-sized patios/balconies, and all new kitchens and baths.', 'Outside you will find an electric car charging station as well!', 'Our management team is here to help you reserve your new home, and offers flexible lease terms – including short-term leases – to adapt to your unique requirements.', 'We want you to have all the support you need to feel comfortable and secure.', 'Our maintenance team is quick to address any issues, and our office staff truly cares about your satisfaction.', 'Our community is conveniently located in Pleasant Hill, near Walnut Creek, Lafayette, Moraga, Danville and La Marinda', 'We are here to answer your questions, and help you reserve your new apartment home.', 'Features:', "Pet Friendly (up to 2 pets), Exquisite hand tiled showers, Over sized Balconies & Patios, Double Paned Windows, Recess lighting, Glass top Range or Gas range*, Spacious layout with large Balconies/Patio's, Stainless steel appliances, Refrigerator, Dishwasher, & Built-in Microwave, Upgraded lighting fixtures, Bullnose Granite Countertops in Kitchen & Bath, In-Unit Washer & Dryer, Ceiling Fan, Newly Remodeled Apartments!, Premium upgraded all-wood kitchen cabinets, Beautiful hardwood flooring throughout", '*Select units only', 'Community Amenities:', 'Dog Park, Beautiful, lush landscaping, Visa / Mastercard Rent Payment Accepted, 2 Pools, 24hr Emergency Maintenance, Free Community WiFi, Electric Car Charging station, Flexible Lease Terms Available 3-12 month leases (as available, additional short-term lease fee applicable for 3-5 month leases.), Pet Friendly, Online Maintenance Requests, Professional Management, Onsite Recycling, Assigned Parking spaces, On-Site Laundry Facility', 'Pet Policy', 'Up to 2 pets per apartment', 'Income Requirements:', '3 X the Rent', 'Use the link below for more details:', '<URL>', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033', 'urUhi4q0rp']
